mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DOCUMENT ( document_id, employee_id , kind, title, d_day, document_cont, document_set, ok_user) VALUES (#{documentId}, #{employeeId}, #{kind}, #{title}, #{dDay}, #{documentCont}, #{documentSet}, #{okUser})
mapper.update: UPDATE document SET document_id = #{documentId}, employee_id = #{employeeId}, kind = #{kind}, title = #{title}, d_day = #{dDay}, document_cont = #{documentCont}, document_set = #{documentSet}, ok_user = #{okUser} WHERE document_id = #{documentId}
mapper.select: SELECT document_id AS documentId, employee_id AS employeeId,kind AS kind, title AS title, TO_CHAR(d_day, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS dDay, document_cont AS documentCont, document_set AS documentSet, ok_user AS okUser FROM document WHERE document_id = #{documentId}
